official_title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: Authorizes the Committeee on Interior and Insular Affairs to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate $4,400, in addition to the amount and for the same investigatory purposes and during the same period specified in Senate Resolution 231, 92nd Congress, agreed to March 6, 1972.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs for inquiries and investigations.
